data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Intimation Of Meeting Of The Board Of Directors
data.news_body: Nagarjuna Fertilizers And Chemicals Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 14/02/2026 inter alia to consider and approve We wish to inform that the Meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is proposed to be scheduled on Saturday February 14 2026 inter alia to consider and approve the Un-audited Financial Results of the Company for the quarter / half year ended December 31 2025 at the registered office of the Company.

data.caption: Intimation Of Request Of Mr. K Vijaya Gopala Raju To Stepdown As Executive Director - Operations Of The Company.
data.news_body: The company has received a communication dated February 07 2026 from Mr. K Vijaya Gopala Raju expressing intention to stepdown from the position of Executive Director- Operations due to personal reasons.

data.caption: Rumour verification - Regulation 30(11)
data.news_body: Clarification of news item published in the newspaper

data.caption: Clarification sought from Nagarjuna Fertilizers and Chemicals Ltd
data.news_body:
The Exchange has sought clarification from Nagarjuna Fertilizers and Chemicals Ltd on January 19 2026 with reference to news appeared in https://www.thehindu.com/ dated January 19 2026 quoting "A.P. CM Deputy CM to perform bhumi puja for Rs.13000-crore green ammonia unit in Kakinada on January 17"

The reply is awaited.

data.news_body: We wish to inform that the Trading Window for transacting in the securities of the Company will remain close from January 01 2026 and will continue to remain close till 48 hours after the declaration of the financial results for the quarter ended December 31 2025.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Management
data.news_body: We wish to inform that Mr. K. Vijaya Gopala Raju Executive Directors - Operation shall be in charge of the Operations with effect from January 01 2026.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Cessation
